Name: A Night at the Races
About the game: Pay your debts. Escape hell. Or just buy another day. Help Nathan beat an adrenaline-packed platformer as part of a tournament, to grab the prize and pay his debts. A different narrative experience on top of an arcade/platformer gameplay. 200+ Levels of frantic platforming. Additional game modes for tons of replayability. Simple controls and hybrid platformer-runner mechanics. Original soundtrack (22 songs). The game includes an assist mode, which enables you to change overall difficulty, game speed and dash cooldown time.
